fields.value: Modeling and robust control of Blu-ray disc servo-mechanisms

dsDescriptionValue.value: In many Industrial servo-control implementations, the radial and focus loops are considered as decoupled, e.g. DVD drives. The impact of such phenomena on the robustness of the servo is evaluated by using experimental data. A controller is designed to reduce the coupling effect by using a suitable disturbance model into problem formulation.

publicationCitation.value: Manu Mitra Modeling and robust control of Blu-ray disc servo-mechanisms. University of Bridgeport (2009)

files.description: In many Industrial servo-control implementations, the radial and focus loops are considered as decoupled, e.g. DVD drives. A controller is designed to reduce the coupling effect by using a suitable disturbance model into problem formulation.
